LocaleResource.Value: Trusted Shops Customer Reviews

LocaleResource.Name: AdminInstruction
LocaleResource.Value:
Please find our step by step set up guide detailed below:

  • Register at Trusted Shops
  • Enter your Trusted Shops ID, username and password in the assigned areas below.
  • Enter the name of your shop, as it should be displayed within the widget.
  • Now the customer reviews will be display in your shop.
  • Determine if your customers should be able to write a review after they've completed an order.
